articles.title: Russian-held nuclear power plant in Ukraine, back on power grid, shuts down - CBC News
articles.description: Ukraine's atomic power operator said Sunday that the last reactor at Europe's largest nuclear power plant has been shut down after the plant was reconnected to the electricity grid.
articles.content: Europe's largest nuclear plant has been reconnected to Ukraine's electricity grid, allowing engineers to shut down its last operational reactor in an attempt to avoid a radiation disaster as fighting… [+1673 chars]

articles.author: Janice Kew and Katie Linsell
articles.title: Shoprite CEO has advice for European retailers amid their electricity crunch - News24
articles.description: European retailers could turn to peers in South Africa for ideas on how to manage the worst energy crisis in decades as they brace for potential blackouts this winter.

articles.author: Pooja Sitaram Jaiswar
articles.title: Markets week ahead: These factors will drive market sentiments from Sept 12-16 | Mint - Mint
articles.description: In the coming trading sessions from September 12 to 16, the US Fed's ultra hawkish remarks coupled with expectations of a 75 basis points rate hike by the European Central Bank (ECB) is likely to play a key role in swaying markets globally including domestic …
